description:
Several days after the incident on the Mystic Eyes Collection Train, there was a solemn ritual at Modern Magecraft Theories for Svin`s ascendance to the rank of Pride. Lord El-Melloi II looked upon the ritual full of emotion as this ascendance to Pride was while his student was still in his teens. Meanwhile, Gray could not shake off the uneasiness that Lord El-Melloi II would depart for distant lands to participate in the Holy Grail War. While in thought, she bumps into Melvin in the streets bustling with the approach of Christmas.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Clock Tower, Usual Days, and the First Step Forward to the Future
Tokeitou to Nichijou to Mirai e no Daiippo
برج الساعة وأيام طبيعية وأول خطوة إلى المستقبل
時計塔と日常と未来への第一歩
